You don’t need to travel first world to experience first world quality of life.

This is Da Nang, Vietnam.

A city where 4 star hotels cost 2400 INR/night.

Next day, hostel arranged a group tour to Ba Na Hills. Solo travel hack: always say yes to group tours.
You meet strangers, you share stories, you collect memories. In just 2 hours, I went from Da Nang’s humid beaches to misty, cloud-wrapped mountains.

If Vietnam is on your 2025 bucket list, SAVE this 

We explored Hanoi, Sapa, Da Nang & Hoi An.

One of the best trips we’ve ever had 

Here’s the full itinerary with flights, hotels, the BEST FOOD & transport hacks

Da Nang, Vietnam is unbelievably affordable 

For just $15/night, I get:
 Sea-facing hotel
 Free breakfast buffet
 Fast Wi-Fi
 Gym &  Pool access
 24/7 AC I control myself
 Well-maintained room with a working desk.

I think Vietnam is better than Bali.

Move to

While everyone rushes to Hanoi or Ho Chi Minh, Da Nang offers something different - a laid-back vibe where luxury costs less than domestic Indian destinations. You get to see Pristine beaches and beautiful hill station, which is just an hour drive.
